Shared.PAGE_TITLE: Set Up Your SXM App Login

FindAccountPageComponent.EXPIRED_PROMO_CODE_HEADLINE: Sorry, but free listening has expired.
FindAccountPageComponent.EXPIRED_PROMO_CODE_INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on the SXM app, enter your info so we can see if you have an existing SiriusXM account or trial subscription.

AccountNotFoundPageComponent.HEADLINE: Let’s try something else.
AccountNotFoundPageComponent.SUBTITLE: We didn't find your subscription with the info you entered, but we can look again using your Radio ID, VIN, or license plate.

RADIO_LOOKUP_INSTRUCTIONS.SUFFIX: and you'll be listening in no time.

AccountNotFoundPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: If you don't have a SiriusXM car radio, or you're only interested in streaming, you can subscribe now. We have plans for every kind of listener.

WITH_STREAMING.HEADLINE: We've found at least one subscription that includes streaming on the SXM App.

INACTIVE.HEADLINE: The subscriptions we found are inactive.
INACTIVE.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on your car radio as well as on the SXM App, you'll need to purchase a subscription. If you choose not to reactivate your subscription, you can also try out the SXM App for free or subscribe to a streaming-only plan.

UPGRADE.HEADLINE: The subscriptions we found are either inactive or do not include streaming.
UPGRADE.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on your car radio as well as on the SXM App, you'll need to reactivate or purchase a subscription.

WITHOUT_STREAMING.HEADLINE: The subscriptions we found do not include streaming.
WITHOUT_STREAMING.INSTRUCTIONS: If you want to listen on your car radio as well as on the SXM App, you'll need to upgrade your subscription.

MultipleSubscriptionsPageComponent.OTHER_ACCOUNTS_INSTRUCTIONS: You have other accounts that can be upgraded or reactivated to include streaming.

CredentialSetupConfirmationPageComponent.HEADLINE: You’re all set up to listen.
CredentialSetupConfirmationPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: Use your username and password to log into the SXM App to start listening.

InactiveSubscriptionPageComponent.HEADLINE: Your subscription is inactive.
InactiveSubscriptionPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on your car radio as well as on the SXM App, you'll need to purchase a new subscription. Begin by reactivating your radio below.

IneligibleAudioWithNoStreamingCapability.HEADLINE: Your subscription doesn't include streaming.
IneligibleAudioWithNoStreamingCapability.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on the SXM App, you'll need to upgrade your subscription below.

IneligibleExpiredAATrialComponent.HEADLINE: We found your trial subscription, but it has expired.
IneligibleExpiredAATrialComponent.MESSAGE_WITH_PHONE_NUMBER: You can't reactivate your car subscription here (please call 1-844-287-9225 to do so), but you can try out the SXM App for free, or subscribe to a streaming-only plan.
IneligibleExpiredAATrialComponent.MESSAGE_WITHOUT_PHONE_NUMBER: You can't reactivate your car subscription here (please contact SiriusXM to do so), but you can try out the SXM App for free, or subscribe to a streaming-only plan.

IneligibleInsufficientPackageComponent.HEADLINE: Your subscription doesn't include streaming.
IneligibleInsufficientPackageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on the SXM App , you'll need to upgrade your subscription below.

IneligibleMaxLifetimeTrialsComponent.HEADLINE: Your subscription doesn't include streaming.
IneligibleMaxLifetimeTrialsComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on the SXM App , you'll need to upgrade your subscription below.

IneligibleTrialWithinLastTrailDateCompon.HEADLINE: Your subscription doesn't include streaming.
IneligibleTrialWithinLastTrailDateCompon.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on the SXM App , you'll need to upgrade your subscription below.

IneligibleNoAudioComponent.HEADLINE: We found your subscription, but it does not include streaming.
IneligibleNoAudioComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: You will need to upgrade a plan before you can stream.

IneligibleNonPayPageComponent.HEADLINE: Your subscription is past due.
IneligibleNonPayPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: Don't miss everything SiriusXM has to offer. Please make a payment to continue listening.

IneligibleNonConsumerComponent.HEADLINE: Your subscription doesn't include streaming.
IneligibleNonConsumerComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: To listen on the SXM App , you'll need to upgrade your subscription below.

STEP_EMAIL_LOOKUP.TITLE: Listen now free for {{numberOfDays}}
STEP_EMAIL_LOOKUP.INSTRUCTIONS: You're steps away from connecting with SiriusXM free through {{endDateText}}. First, we need your email to setup your subscription.
STEP_EMAIL_LOOKUP.ALREADY_HAVE_LOGIN: Already have a login to stream?
STEP_EMAIL_LOOKUP.INELIGIBLE_TITLE: You are ineligible for a trial.
STEP_EMAIL_LOOKUP.INELIGIBLE_INSTRUCTIONS: We're sorry but you are not eligible for another SiriusXM trial at this time. However, we have some special offers on subscriptions you can check out.
STEP_EMAIL_LOOKUP.EXISTING_ACCOUNT_TITLE: You already have a SiriusXM account.
STEP_EMAIL_LOOKUP.EXISTING_ACCOUNT_INSTRUCTIONS: You can recover your credentials or sign in to your account.

ERRORS.SYSTEM_ERROR: We’re sorry… something went wrong. We’re experiencing technical issues and are working on resolving it. Please try again.

STEP_ACTIVATION.TITLE: Almost there. Here is your new username.
STEP_ACTIVATION.END_ON_TEXT: Your free streaming subscription will automatically end on {{endDateText}}.
STEP_ACTIVATION.AGREEMENT_INSTRUCTIONS: By continuing, you agree that this subscription is governed by our
STEP_ACTIVATION.AGREEMENT_CONSENT_PART_1: By registering, you agree that SiriusXM may contact you with special offers, please see our
STEP_ACTIVATION.AGREEMENT_CONSENT_PART_2: to learn more about how SiriusXM collects and processes your personal information. You can manage your contact preferences through your online account.

FreeListenConfirmationPageComponent.TITLE: We've sent you an email.
FreeListenConfirmationPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS:
Look for our email on how to set up your account. If you don't see it soon, check your Spam folder.

Once your account setup is complete, you can listen to SiriusXM on connected devices with the SXM App.

CreatePasswordPageComponent.TITLE: Create Your Password
CreatePasswordPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: Enter your new password for your account.

ERRORS.LENGTH: Your password must be {{ min }} to {{ max }} characters long.
ERRORS.POLICY: Your password must contain at least one character from at least 3 different groups, as explained in our password policy.
ERRORS.GENERIC: Your password does not fulfill all the requirements
ERRORS.PII_DATA: Password cannot contain first name, last name or email address.

ERRORS.SYSTEM_ERROR: We’re sorry… something went wrong. We’re experiencing technical issues and are working on resolving it. Please try again.
ERRORS.INVALID_PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN_ERROR: Invalid password token. Please try again.
ERRORS.EXPIRED_PASSWORD_RESET_TOKEN_ERROR: Password token expired. Please try again.

CreatePasswordConfirmationPageComponent.TITLE: We’ve updated your password.
CreatePasswordConfirmationPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: You can now start listening online or on the app.

ACTIVATION_CODE.HEADLINE: Activate your device
ACTIVATION_CODE.INSTRUCTIONS: Enter the activation code that appears on your device screen.
ACTIVATION_CODE.FORM_ERROR_INVALID_ACTIVATION_CODE: Your security code is either incorrect or has expired.
ACTIVATION_CODE.FORM_ERROR_SYSTEM: We’re sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

SIGN_IN.HEADLINE: Next sign into your SiriusXM account to finish activating your device.
SIGN_IN.INSTRUCTIONS: Use your SiriusXM account or SXM App login.

FORM_ERROR_INVALID_ACTIVATION_CODE_PIECE.PART_1: Your activation code has expired. Please

SIGN_IN.FORM_ERROR_INVALID_CREDENTIALS: We don't recognize your username or password. Please try again.
SIGN_IN.FORM_ERROR_SYSTEM: We’re sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

ActivatedDeviceCompletedPageComponent.HEADLINE: You’re all set !
ActivatedDeviceCompletedPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS: You can now enjoy SiriusXM on your device.
ActivatedDeviceCompletedPageComponent.INSTRUCTIONS_SONOS: You can now enjoy SiriusXM on your Sonos. Return to the Sonos app to finish setup and start listening.
